post.content:
Q. What do you typically do after work?
A. I go home early and I don't think about the work at all, relaxing and comforting myself so that I can start very energetic next day.
** What an interviwer wants to hear is about your passion at your profession. You could have said something like that you spend your free time to improve your skills or to read some books/articles keeping abreast of the new technology. However, you actually have to do such to avoid the pain of your conscience. :)
post.title: How to fail a job interview (1) What do you do after work?
